text: Di Kamoe kon han meukirem ayat 5 Nyang jeut mukjizat keu jih tapeugah i Sabab ka dilee meukirem ayat f ‘Oh troh sulet that di jih jipeugah ” Keu kawom Tsamud Kamoe bri unta Jieu ngon matajih trang sileupah Unta inong nyan pih jielanya Padahai hana sapeue meusalah Meukirem ayat Kamoe peutakot Mangat jiturot bek le jibantah
